The pool and hot tub very clean and warm. Grounds well taken care of . Close to eating, shopping, Disney parks etc. It is a great place for families ( kids) It was quite. Bartender was friendly and very helpfull with directions and park information. We highly recommend, affordable. WE WILL RETURN. Darrell & Geri Jan 3, 2011

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Karena1stof4
Reviews.Content: We checked in a couple hours after check in time. Check in was quick. There was a $50 hold for incidentals but it was refundable. Upon entering the room, I was a little disappointed at the size of the living area. There is a large mirror behind the sofa that made me think the room was larger when I saw it on the website. Otherwise, it looked almost exactly like the picures on the website and was adequate for the four of us. One of the barstools was missing, but shortly after I called to report it, another one was brought. My five year old locked one of the bedroom doors and once reported, maintainance came and unlocked it. The kitchen was well furnished and had all the needed utensils, cooking items and other kitchen items including coffee maker, toaster, blender. There is a full sized fridge, stove, and dishwasher. There was a flat screen downstairs but not in the bedrooms in this particular unit. The beds were very comfortable and the washer and dryer was great to have with three kids in tow. It was quiet in the area where we were. Everything was clean and appeared to be in good repair. I was impressed with how convenient it was to a variety of restaurants, Publix grocery store, Walgreens and shops all within walking distance or a short drive of less than a mile or two. This was a plus for me. The Disney parks were a short drive and so was the outlet mall. Universal and Islands of Adventures were probably about a 15 minute drive away. What I liked best was the comfort of the unit and the convenience of the location. What I liked least was that I could not get the same rate for a couple more days.

Reviews.Title: “Great Vacation Value”
Reviews.Author: darigg
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have been going to Vacation Villas (I and II) for 13 years. We have always been greeted with a smile from the front staff, and we have always enjoyed the peace and quiet that this resort offers to you. At the same time there is plenty to do at the resort with the pools, tennis courts, fitness facilities etc. These will only improve once all of the renovations are completed in the coming few months. We have always enjoyed the accomodations and the cleanliness of the rooms. The landscaping has improved each and evey year, and as timeshare owners, it's nice to see that the yearly maintenance fees are being put to good use. Having said that, we unfortunately are in a position where we need to sell the one week that we have at both Vacation Villas (I and II). If there are any who have written positive comments regarding their stay at this resort, that would be interested in purchasing a week from us, we would be interested in hearing from you.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: sunlover1997
Reviews.Content: We stayed here last Oct - early Nov. I had requested an updated unit and received it. It had granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and flat screen tv's in both bedrooms and the living room. The free wireless speed was good but it was unsecured. We arrived before check-in but our unit was ready and we were able to get in early. I loved having a washer and dryer, just throw a load in the washer in the morning and move it to the dryer in the evening. You really don't need to pack alot of clothes. The safe is large enought to fit a laptop. Lots of hot water and good shower pressure. We didn't need to pick up anything extra, everything was provided except for laundry soap and dryer sheets. We had a couple of items missing from our unit but I just called the front desk and had them note it. Towels are exchanged on Wed but if you need them sooner they will bring them if you call. We had a phone call about a timeshare presentation, letting us know who to contact if we were interested. They will give you a $75.00 gift certificate if you go as a thank you. I can't tell you how long the presentation is as we didn't do it. We were there over halloween and they hosted a party at the tennis courts for the kids. The main pool area and the pool in our court was under construction while we were there but they had 2 other pools we used. One was unheated, the other heated with a children's pool and a hot tub. The basketball court has been removed, they are making way for a lazy river, water slide, pool, hot tub area that will be really nice when it is finished in 2011. The pool by our court will be a lap pool with a snack bar. We will definitly return to see the improvements. As stated, there was construction but nothing too noisy or dirty, at least not from our area. We were in unit #2011 in the mgm court. All of the staff that we dealt with were very friendly, helpful and courteous. We would recommend Fantasy World to everyone and are already making plans to return with friends.

Reviews.Title: “DON'T GO THERE”
Reviews.Author: tallybelle
Reviews.Content: we booked for 7 nights with Expedia travel, reviews were both good and bad but we thought we would give itt he benefit of the doubt...............1950's would be a good description, the pool looked like it was out of a hollywood museum! home was clean, green nylon carpets throughout, and beds were clean and comfortable. area was very noizy, police cares frequent through the night and lots of people wandering around? we booked out the next morning as staying there would have ruined our holiday completely.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, clean and well organised”
Reviews.Author: bubblefishette
Reviews.Content: We (that is myself, my husband and grown-up children aged 22, 20 and 16 years) stayed here late August early September 2010 and were all very impressed. The accommodation was very spacious and had everything we needed. The location was excellent. We did not spend many daytime hours at the villa as we were too busy having fun at the parks. The staff were always polite and helpful and when we had trouble with opening the safe on the day of our arrival, they promptly dealt with it. Always felt safe there and one evening I walked back from the pool at midnight with my grown-up children and never felt in any danger. The kitchen had everything we needed, although I must admit we did eat all of our meals out, except for breakfast. Having the washing machine and tumble dryer was a definite bonus. I'm not sure how full it was when we stayed, but it always seemed quiet. I have only one complaint, and that is we had to come home. None of us wanted to leave and if money was no object, but unfortunately it is, would be going back next year.

Reviews.Title: “hidden jewel in kissimmee”
Reviews.Author: sonnetteoil
Reviews.Content: I love this place. We had a villa that have 2 bedroom, 2 bath, kitchen and living room. It's very nice and cute place. Also this place is clean. all of the amenities in the villa is in good condition like brand new. In the resort have pool, fitness center, playground, Tennis, basketball, gameroom etc. The important thing, in the villa have washer and dryer that i can do laundry before i go back home (that was nice) absolutely recommend to everyone. By the way, they have business center and free printing if u forget to print ticket, this place can help.

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely return here in the future”
Reviews.Author: plumbing
Reviews.Content: We stayed here the last week of September. It was just my husband and myself, but this would be a great spot for a family with 1 or 2 children. The unit was 2 story & had two bedrooms, 1 had a queen, 1 had 2 twin beds, a full bath with tub/shower unit on the 2nd floor & a full bath with stand up shower unit only on the 1st floor. Our unit was very clean and updated. We had plenty of towels since it was just the 2 of us. They also provide a few towels for the pool. There was an in-room safe and hairdryer. The utensils in the kitchen were adequate for what we needed, and they did provide a small bottle of dish soap, shampoo & soap for bathrooms, a roll of papertowels, and a 1 use box of Tide & 2 sheet Bounce for the washer/dryer. The time of year was great - very short lines at Universal but the weather is iffy. Universal is about 20-30 min drive depending on traffic, Disney is much closer. There are a ton of chain type restaurants nearby but I'd definitely rent a car. We joined the local gym in Celebration - about 5-10 min away. There is a Publix, Sams Club, Wal Mart & Super Target very close by as well. Overall, we had a great time and would return if we were going back to Orlando again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place to Visit - Might return when updated”
Reviews.Author: stik59
Reviews.Content: We went there in June of this year. We ended up with a non-renovated unit. The unti was nice enough but everything was dated. We had lots of room for 3 adults and 2 children however one adult needed to sleep on the sofa bed whcich was a little unconfortable.For the amount of time we spent in the room it was nice. We were very close to one of the 3 pools so it made my daughters day to be able to go for a swim every night before bed. Restarants are very close by. The walmart needs a car or taxi to get to. the only thing i would like to stay is watch the time share pitch...they do offer a free disney day or $75 from the outback but they are a little pushy and if i had not stepped in we were not going to get out of there by saying no

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great price.”
Reviews.Author: cindyf123
Reviews.Content: This place was perfectt for our 4 day stay in Florida. Close to Disney, and many other attractions. Numerous places to eat close by also. Rooms were clean, and comfortable. Loved the screened in porch. Would definitely stay hear again. Never made it to the pool or onsite bar. Staff was more than helpful. Although it is a timeshare, we were never pressured into anything. Got a phone call one day, asking us to stop in the lobby to fill out a survery and find out how we could stay at a reduced rate on our next trip, but we politely declined and were not bothered again! Price was right, location was right, had all the comforts of home!

Reviews.Title: “This is a poorly-managed complex ...”
Reviews.Author: WorldTraveler007-01
Reviews.Content: We thought that the prices were good, and I guess if you like cheap, then they are OK. But these are TIMESHARES and I think that majority of the highly favorable ratings are from management shills or from timeshare owners. The location is OK and close to Disney. 192 is a major street and there are many restaurants nearby, but also a LOT of vacant spaces. This complex needs to be razed and rebuilt. They apparently just got painted, but the doors were left alone, so the paint is uneven. The interiors are still really old and dated, and the front desk said that we must have gotten an old unit when we complained. Why weren't we given a choice? The biggest problem was the pool area. There is no control over the kids, and the pool is not kept clean and there is little chlorine. After just a few minutes in it, my wife ended up with a HUGE boil on her face! There is no WARNING to shower before entering the pool and NO ONE does it. Kids sit in the hot tub and laugh when they fart. I am sure they are peeing in it, and there are NO PARENTS around. As I write this, there is LOUD music in the pool area and a DJ yelling at the top of his lungs to reach an audience of 10 people. It is DEAFENING! When I asked if he could turn it down, he said that people couldn't hear it! Just bizarre! It is the loudest, most obnoxious thing ever, and the music might be appropriate for a ghetto bar, but not for what is supposed to be FAMILIES on VACATION! They clearly have no idea who they are trying to attract. I would NOT recommend this place as it is for TIMESHARE owners and they try to sell guests on the timeshare. If I wanted a timeshare, I would seek them out. The "exercise" room is at the front of the reception building with a HUGE glass window so that there is NO privacy. There were THREE pieces of equipment. Terrible "amenity". The "security" appears to consist of one old man who drives around late at night. I noticed several groups of kids and adults who were not guests, yet were using the basketball court and pool. This can't be good for security! The final comment is on the Internet. You have to take your own computer for access from the rooms, and it is reasonably fast, but the problem is there is NO SECURITY. It is not encrypted, so you really cannot even access email without risk!

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended resort”
Reviews.Author: CoDorset
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Fantasy World Club Villas for 8 nights in late August. The choice of the resort was intentional having researched carefully for the type of place I wanted. Going with reasonably high expectations is always dangerous, but I have to say I was not disappointed. Yes, the property is not the newest around. It was clearly built some time ago and the efforts being made by the owners to update the resort is evidence that they acknowledge this. But don't let that put you off as this place is fantastic value for money. The extra facilities, including lazy river feature will make this place even better. It comes very well equipped with everything you need for a family - including a kettle! The washer/dryer is great and we found really simple to use. Furniture was OK, nothing special but functional and clean. The layout of villa was perfect for us with 2 teenage daughters. A room to themselves and 2 bathrooms between us, which is an absolute necessity. Having visited Florida a few times already we were not desperate to run around and get frazzled so took advantage of the pool which was fine - we tended to go there in the morning and between 9.30am and 11am had it mainly to ourselves. It was clean and well maintained and most days there were maintenance staff out cleaning the place up really well. Our experience was that the staff were great. We checked in at 1am after a flight delay and were greeted courteously and professionally by the guy at reception. On another occasion got great help printing out some literature. Check out at 5.30am was equally good. Location is great - it is at the top end of Kissimmee so you are really close to I4 and I-Drive, and Disney is 10 minutes. Easy access as well for Seaworld and Universal. Plenty of restaurants and shops nearby - including Olive Garden which I recommend. If you want to make the most of your trip do get out from the theme parks and try the 'real' Florida for a bit. We visited Kelly Park in Apopka (entry $5) and rented tubes for $3 from a stall on the way into the state park. You can then spend 30 minutes drifting down the river with accompanying turtles, fish and otters swimming around you! Truly magical and my only regret is not visiting until our last day as my kids said it was the best thing we had done! Back to the resort - great place, clean and well maintained, excellent staff, good location and really good value for money. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “Will go again, definately!”
Reviews.Author: lucidia75
Reviews.Content: We had a terrific time, I went with my husband my two daughters 18 and 21 and my son with his fiancee. The villa was beautiful, everything what we expected. The inside of the villa was comfortable for the six of us, we all slept so good, I didn't even miss my home. Everything was close by even Disney World. We went grocery shopping at Walmart Supercenter which is my favorite place. The pool area was great. We loved the place so much that my husband and I, we are thinking of moving to Florida in a couple of years or even sooner. No regrets at all. The Rivera Family from Cliffwood Beach, NJ

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyment of a home atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: Dreamland10
Reviews.Content: My family of six enjoyed the atmosphere of our villa where it felt like a home away from home. Instead of the confinement of a hotel we were quite comfortable; use of kitchen for meals & a washer/dryer. Also appreciated the bathroom showers; forcefull hot water felt good. Staff was very friendly and helpful in all areas. Although the area was very quite, found it slow and would need an overview of more updated exciting, enticing, things to do before or after returning from the parks. Downfall: would like the pool areas updated to include a big water park, more excitement of water activities as well as a separate children's pool for the little ones. Although it was just too hot to be outside, indoor activities could include maybe rock climbing, bowling, etc... Convienence of stores, including Walmart nearby. I would revisit again.

Reviews.Title: “A TRULY FANTASTIC RESORT!!”
Reviews.Author: X42316
Reviews.Content: When looking for a place to stay during our visit to Florida, we were faced with a huge amount of options including hotels and villas. We eventually chose to have the Fantasy World Club Villas as our accommodation and what a fantastic choice that was! Upon arrival, we were greeted by the very friendly reception staff (most of whom are from Latin America, but speak very good English) and were checked in very quickly. Our villa was conveniently located just across the street from the lobby and front desk and I can't praise it highly enough. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you could possibly need including toaster, hobs, oven, microwave, coffee maker, kettle, fridge and dishwasher among other things. There is also a living room that is quite spacious with cable TV and sofas, along with a table for eating. A bathroom with shower can also be found on the ground floor. Upstairs is just as good, with 2 bedrooms - one with double bed and one with 2 single beds and both were extremely clean and had TVs and wardrobes. There was plenty of room for 2 adults and 2 teens aged 16 and 14. Also upstairs is a washing machine and another bathroom that has a bath tub. Free WiFi is available in the villas, but the connection can be rather slow at times. In terms of facilities, tennis courts and basketball courts are available for use aswell as 3 swimming pools that are open from early morning until mignight. I did not know a lot of the facilities existed until we met some lovely Americans who told us about the fitness centre, children's playground and the other 2 pools we had not discovered!! Also included are activity and arcade video game rooms, a pool bar selling drinks and snacks and a business centre with computers offering free internet access. A shuttle is available to Universal Resort, but there is only one per day which leaves at around 9am and returns around 7pm. There is also one for Disney World and Sea World, but I am unsure of timings for these as we didn't use them. The complex is located a couple of miles away from Interstate 4 which provides the easiest access to the theme parks (Universal, DIsney etc). We did manage to get lost a few times though, especially at night, so taking a Sat Nav may be a smart option to avoid this. For eating out, there is a very nice grill which is less than half a mile down the road called Smokey Bones, which I would definitely recommend. There are many more eating places though that are no more than 5 miles away including IHOP, TGI Fridays and Cracker Barrel. If you wish to order food to eat in your villa, there is a Domino's pizza, as well as several other take-away options including Chinese and Indian Also, Walmarts are in abundance in this part of town, so finding groceries for any meals isn't a problem. Overall, this is a wonderful complex of villas that offer clean and convenient accommodation for any ages. The staff are all very helpful and most of the guests were very friendly Americans who are very pleasant to socialize with - we met several new friends who we continue to maintain contact with! I'd definitely recommend it as a base for your vacation in Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: hope95
Reviews.Content: This was a great and spacious place to stay with my family. We have three children and there was enough space for everyone. I would recommend that you rent a car, there is a bus that brings you to the park, however, it only come at 8:30 and 11:30 in the morning, and brings you bace before the parks closes. Very equipped kitchen and there shopping centers which helps save on food expenses. Washer/dryer pick up extra detergent. I am returning next year and plan to stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfy, well located”
Reviews.Author: paleandinteretsing
Reviews.Content: We have returned from a two week stay in these villas. They were very clean and comfortable. The furniutre was all of good quality, although the style looked a little dated. It was equipped with everything you could possibly want - washer, dryer, cooker, dishwasher, blender, hand mixer, toaster - but no kettle! I had to boil up my water in a saucepan for a cup of tea. A starter kit of dishwasher powder, washing powder, soap. tumble sheets and shampoo were also included. The concierge was very efficient and helpful. The villas were spotless. We had weekly housekeeping with the rental, but when this didnt materialise, we had to go and ask. Having said that, it was done very quickly whilst we were out. They are very well located near to Disney and the I4 as well as all the Kissimmee restaurants. Would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “"All round good"”
Reviews.Author: Electra123
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for two week in October, the villa was brilliant, and close to all the theme parks. The staff are very helpful and friendly, and the complex is great for security. One night we stayed in the pool longer than my sister, and because we didnt have a key she left the door slightly open. When we got back there was someone from security there checking everything was alright within the space of 10 minutes. Also i was ill in the first few days, and we rang the reception up about 10:00pm at night and asked them to get a doctor for me, within minutes they rang back telling us when he will be there and within half and hour he came. The only bad point was ants in the kitchen but this is to be exspected in that heat we was staying in, in America. But even that the next morning someone was round trying to sort it out. I would recommend this place to everyone, it's great for all ages!

Reviews.Title: “Great Villa - handy location”
Reviews.Author: Shortstraw79
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a self catering villa near to all the attractions then this is the villa for you. It is situated close to all theme parks, with daily shuttles taking you to them. The rooms are big nice and clean but I think they are only cleaned once a week, but we were hardly ever there due to going to the parks. There is a nice pool, bar and games area for those quiet days and a huge Wallmart around the corner. If you did stay here then I would recommend hiring a car as there is no restaurant on site and it is a short walk to the nearest restaruant, and when you first arrive, walking in the dark looking for food isn't the best. All staff were friendly however, they did keep trying to push us into buying a timeshare which I wasn't too impressed with. I would come back to here no problems.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal for families”
Reviews.Author: NickyNorthants
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 weeks in May 2010. We thought this would suit us (family of 4) better than a disney hotel with only 1 room and 2 double beds. How right we were. The accommodation we got was clean and spacious. It was everything we wanted or needed. 2 bedrooms (1 with twin beds & 1 with queen sized bed), washer dryer, 2 bathrooms - both with showers (1 with a bath), separate full size kitchen, dining area, lounge area. total of 3 TV's - ideal for the kids to unwind after a hot and busy day at the parks. There was plenty of space to park outside as well. We were located across the road from the main reception, pool area and tennis courts. The pool was clean, warm and open until 12pm. The bar was friendly. The location was ideally located for Disney/SeaWorld parks. There was also a Publix supermarket very close by. We arrived at 7.30pm and had no problem with check in. There were plenty of towels (hand, bath and pool). We were also left a selection of cleaning products (kitchen roll, scourer, washing up liquid, dishwasher tabs, washing machine powder and tumble drier sheets). These were replaced after 1 week when the property was given a thorough clean. There was free wi-fi but it was a bit tempermental at certain times of the day. Definitely a place to return to, if we ever visited the area again.

Reviews.Title: “Incredible Value”
Reviews.Author: doughark
Reviews.Content: We have a family of 6 and this condo was perfect for our trip. The price was amazing and the condo was clean, comfortable and well-equipped. They are in the process of painting the outside of the buildings. Our section was already complete and the interior was very nice as well. We have been to Orlando numerous times and this was perfect for us. When you have 6 people in a family, 2 of them teenagers, 1 hotel room is just too small. All of the Disney parks were very close. I believe on the GPS the furthest away was like 8 miles. My kids enjoyed the pool which was just outside our door. There was always parking right in front of our unit. It also had free wifi. I just don't think you could beat the value. We booked on Hotwire and I kept expecting to get billed an additional cleaning fee or resort fee. (it never happened).

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Welshnewfie
Reviews.Content: The 2 bedroom town houses have everything you need for a value vacation in Florida. They are clean and well equiped. They are also close to EVERYTHING. Right in the middle of all attractions yet not too noisy. The pool and bar are open until midnight. The kids and adults loved this. All in all a great place to stay without spending a fortune.

Reviews.Title: “We re definitely going back.”
Reviews.Author: Pearl1013
Reviews.Content: Fantasy World is an ideal place for families and people who would want to stay together in one unit and hang out together.It has all the amenities that a family needs- washer and dryer, kitchen. dishwasher and it even has a screened patio. It is very well maintained and clean and the staff is exceptional nice and helpful. While we were there we could see that they are upgrading the facilities so we are definitely going stay there again on our next trip to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “A lot of amenities and great value!”
Reviews.Author: ambmeglydcam
Reviews.Content: We stayed for one week 4/8 to 4/15/2010. We are a family of 6. This place was very inexpensive for everything we got. The kids loved the pool which was open until Midnight every night! There is also a mini arcade with air hockey that my kids really enjoyed. For the younger kids, there is an activity room with lots of toys and fun. We played tennis and basketball as well right at the resort. There is also a playground for the kids. We loved the newly renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a dishwasher. Saved us a lot of money on eating out. The only complaints that I have are that the shower curtain was too short for the shower and water leaked all over the floor everytime I took a shower. Also the dryer didn't work well at all. Took 1.5 hours to dry a load of laundry. I was glad to have the washer and dryer in the room though! The primary pool area is a little dated and the screened in back porches are as well, but the kids enjoyed them and there are updates planned. Kerig coffee maker in the lobby with complimentary coffee was a great added bonus!!! Lots of renovations planned for this resort. Looking forward to seeing the renovations next year. Would definitely recommend this resort for families with children as there is a lot to do and the location is perfect. Lots of shopping and parks nearby!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place - lots to do”
Reviews.Author: afletcher30
Reviews.Content: This was our first time staying at one of the time share properties and we were not dissapointed. There were 3 of us and we stayed in a 6 person apartment which was on two levels with two bedrooms an upstairs bathroom and a downstairs bathroom. The accommodation was great, clean and well equipped, we were more than happy. There was some building work being done but we received a written apology on check in and the builders only worked between 9am - 6.30pm to be fair when most people are out and about. There is a good choice of local food and there is a complimentary bus to the parks (although we were not overly impressed with the driver who was sultry and rude). There are three pools - two quieter ones and a large heated pool with bar and music, tennis courts and computer access with printers should you need it. The staff on the desk are helpfu and knowledgable. All in all a good place to stay with the family.

Reviews.Title: “Good location but watch out for the builders”
Reviews.Author: Skippy060
Reviews.Content: This is a really lovely resort in terms of location and the villas are spacious, well equipped and comfortable. There are three pools, tennis courts, basketball and water play areas and the kids loved it. However major building renovations are planned over the next few months and they started whilst we were there. The builders carried on working on the villas whilst we were in residence and one morning we came out of our door to find it taped off with yellow caution tape. Another morning a builder walked into our patio to plug in an electric socket whilst we were having breakfast. We were worried about the loose tiles left of the roof incase they fell down and hit one of the kids. There was also old facia boards lying around with long nails sticking out. We asked the builders to rope things off and/or knock but they did not seem bothered. We did complain to the manageress who was lovely and did her very best to sort it out but as there are major renovations planned throughout this year, you may want to leave it till next year (the renovations look fantastic by the way - will be worth it when done).

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: otietz
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a week in Orlando visiting Disney parks. Stayed here the entire time, enjoyed the place very much. Rooms are big and very well equiped. Service was good, location great (we had our own car), highly recommeneded

Reviews.Title: “2010 will be our 4th year staying at Fantasy World”
Reviews.Author: RUNRT66
Reviews.Content: 2010 will be our 4th year in a row staying at Fantasy World. We always book online and only on the resorts website. Booking thru another source could present a problem if you needed to make changes in your stay. When we travel we do the road trip from Illinois to Florida. Each and every time we arrived we were warmly welcomed by members of the staff. Carolina Grace and Jose (Jo-Say) as well as Sandy C are among the stars at this resort. We travel with 3 kids up to 16 and they all can not wait to get here. When you walk in the town home it smells clean!!! You will feel comfortable to kick off your shoes. As you walk into the unit the kitchen sparkles w/full range, full fridge, DW. Full size dining table to sit and relax and save big $ eating in. Now listen because this alone could pay for itself especially with the W/D in room where you can do laundry at your convience. Nice upstairs w/ 2bd rms and another full bath, Down stairs has sleeper sofa which we never used but I would guess it would be the same as any other sleeper sofa. Ample parking that we have always felt safe and secure in. We drive to Disney about 15 minutes away but an easy drive and a chance to scope out shopping and a place to grab a bite which we always bring back to the unit. The worst part of the whole experience is having to say goodbye. PS If anyone knows of a clean affordable hotel around Dalton / Cartersville area I would sure like to hear about it because the places we found so far we will never stay at again.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice for families”
Reviews.Author: peanut718
Reviews.Content: We were in Florida with me, my Mom, my bf, and a 14 and 18 years old girls. The place is very clean, there are 2 bathrooms, which made it easier to get everyone showered and ready. they have a washer/ dryer right off the master bedroom, so it was pretty nice to come home with no laundry to do. The staff was very helpful. You are very close to the attractions. Right down the street are all the resturants. the pool and jacuzzi were nice to go to at night. It was a very good price for the place. Was enjoyed by all............

Reviews.Title: “Great villa, great location, great stay!”
Reviews.Author: lesdear
Reviews.Content: We were a group of 2 moms and 3 young kids. We did not use any of the resort amenities but there was a heated pool and basketball court that I did see people using. Would be great for families with older kids when they need to get away from each other for a bit. There is a Publix grocery store right around the corner. It was great to be able to have breakfast and dinner out of the parks. The kitchen had everything you need to prepare a full meal, with the exception of a cookie sheet/baking pan, but we worked around that. There are some sample packs of dish and dishwasher detergent and laundry detergent, along with a few garbage bags.For us the only negaticve of the place was the townhouse layout. Like I said, we had 3 small kids but they were old enough to manuever stairs on their own. Babies and toddlers might be difficult to keep wrangled away from the stairs. We booked through Expedia and paid only $71 a night. Some people like to stay on Disney property, but if you will have a car, and little kids, I highly rec a condo. Parking is easy, loading a stroller onto a tram is no problem. The parks are only a few minutes from the villa. We could be completely in a park within 30 minutes from the villa.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: terryulsterman
Reviews.Content: For a family looking for a convenient base near to all the WD attractions then try Fantasy World Villas. These well appointed and spacious villas are situated on a very family orientated development. Staff etc are extremely pleasant and helpful with any questions you may have. The area within Kissimmee doesnt have a lot to offer but then again if you just need a base it is fine.

Reviews.Title: “Good bargin, good location”
Reviews.Author: erinm78
Reviews.Content: My friends and I went down the Orlando the first week of January. We enjoyed staying at the resort. The room had a lot more to it than the website let on. The kitchen had everything you need. .The living room is spacious. Both of the rooms upstairs were nice. One has two twin beds, so it was a little funny, but I'm sure it would be good for kids. The price was right and it was relatively close to Disney World.

Reviews.Title: “Best buy in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: TheKrajnyks
Reviews.Content: I was not sure of where to book our stay but after much research, I took a chance and booked Fantasy World Villas for our family trip to the Orlando area. The property is well maintained for it's age, now turning 30. The villa was comfortable and in great shape. What I liked most about this property...NO HIDDEN FEES! The price you book at is the price you pay. How novel is that? The staff was friendly and very helpful. Forget about parking fees at the theme parks. Fantasy World Club Villas have shuttle buses that run to Sea World, DisneyWorld and Universal. For a family of four stay in Orlando, you can do well by booking Fantasy World Club Villas. Just one negative, do not use the free Wi-Fi service. After using it for three days, my computer was loaded with malicious viruses. Thankfully, I was able to restore my computer and purge the viruses but if you're not that tech savvy, bring your Mi-Fi card or Broadband connection through your cell provider to assure a safe connection.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: byebyejack
Reviews.Content: Best place to stay, clean, lot's a room and very well equip for extended stay! It is a Time share but we where not in any way bougther by them for a tour or buying a Time share. Would recommend to anyone with family

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant, comfortable place to stay”
Reviews.Author: ehellmich
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed staying here for the week after Christmas 2009. We were here for our son to play in the Disney Soccer Showcase so we didn't use the shuttle to go to the parks. However, his games were at Wide World of Sports and it was a short 10-15 minute drive to get there. The townhouse was great. Plenty of room for all four of us. Full/queen size bed in one bedroom and two twins in the other. Pull out couch in the living room - which my son used and said was comfortable. There are two full bathrooms although the shower in the downstairs bathroom is a bit small. Plenty of restaurants, stores, etc. close by. The area we were in was very quiet and we enjoyed out stay. If we were back in the area we would stay here again. The pools seemed nice. It was a bit cold when were here so we didn't really use them. THe front desk staff was very nice and ready to help if we needed it. While the complex may not be as upscale as some in the area we really enjoyed it. There is wireless internet in the units. We used it many times with out laptop and didn't have any problems.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay, kids loved the heated pool! would stay again!!”
Reviews.Author: Mulc4
Reviews.Content: This place was like they say "a home away from home". It had all the amenities in the villa that you would need. We went to Walmart and bought some food for breakfast and snacks. this saved us alot of money when visiting the parks. We packed a backpack full of snacks and water every day. The Villa staff was very helpful and friendly! Our concierge, Russ, was wonderful. He went out of his way to make sure we were happy! The heated swimming pool was a great place for the kids to unwind after a long day at the parks. The one bad thing is there isn't a restaurant on site, but there are several within walking distance. We will definately stay here the next time we travel to Florida!!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasent enougth, but wouldn't return”
Reviews.Author: skybluesam87
Reviews.Content: Stayed for three weeks Oct/Nov 09, booked through virgin, we needed somewhere fairly cheap as we were travelling with another family, but wanted our own space. I had Googled the villas and was concerned that some of then were fairly close to 192 and most of them backed on to one another. I emailed them and asked for a villa at the rear of the property and next to our friends. They honoured our request and I was glad i asked, it was quiet and we overlooked trees. The villa which is actually a town house was a reasonable size, had all equipment you would expect and was clean and basic. Double room and twin room and bathroom upstairs with ample storage space and washer/dryer also. there was a safe in the closet of the main bedroom. Downstairs kitchen living room with sofa bed, we did not need to use the sofa bed but our friends did and said it was comfortable. there was also a shower room. House keeping came in once a week on a sunday changed sheets and replenished soap etc. The villas were in easy walking distance of 192, for shops and eating, there is also a Publix in walking distance. There is a shuttle service to Epcot and Universal studios which our friends used a few times, return times were not good if you wanted to see the fireworks at MK. By car it was 10-12 mins to disney main gate so they were well placed for Disney, 20 - 30 mins to universal. My one concern was that not being a gated resort was that anyone could wonder in off the street. and I did have an issue with their sprinkler systen which although was only on twice, absolutly stunk of sewage and was very close to the villas. The internet connection in our villa was rubbish, it may be because we were furtherest away from reception. Over all, our stay ther was fine, the staff were friendly, the pool was OK smallish though, but I did see they were planning a referb of the pool area. It was well placed for disney, I would recommeded a car, but there is the shuttle and it is on the lynx bus route. I wouldn't return ther because IMO there is more modern accomodation nearby of a simular price, having said that our friends loved it and would return again.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for the price”
Reviews.Author: APDMOM
Reviews.Content: PROS: Large unit. Walking distance to Publix, Olive Garden, Subway, etc. Nice pool & tennis courts. Newly renovated units and office. Nice playground. CONS: Need a car - limited shuttle service. Far away from theme parks, but relatively easy drive to Disney and Universal.

Reviews.Title: “no internet in the rooms”
Reviews.Author: Splishsplash41
Reviews.Content: Make sure you don't pay too much to stay here. This place was ok but I'd rate it as a 2 star. The location is good and it was pretty clean. The shower was icky and needed to be regrouted or replaced. The kitchen was fully equipped and it's a decent sized 2 bedroom, 3 bath room. The kids thought the kiddy pool was icy cold but the big pool was a little warmer and it has a hot tub. Fantasy claims to have internet but the only internet here is in the lobby of the reception building. If you claim to have internet, you'd better have it in the rooms! Another thing that made the place seem second rate was the bed bug inspection. Yuck! We came home one night to find a note under the door informing us that they would be entering our room with a dog to sniff for bed bugs. We had to be up and out by 10 am for the dog to come in and sniff our beds. I didn't hear of the results of the search but I think they should throw out the beds and get something more comfortable to sleep on.

Reviews.Title: “Home from Home”
Reviews.Author: mealtime1964
Reviews.Content: Very friendly and helpful. Villas were tidy and well kept. Lots of things for the kids to do. Restaurants close by and a Wallmart not very far away. Free Shuttle bus to Epcot, Seaworld and Universal Studios saved on the driving as you can get to all the parks from these 3 places. Think the only downfall for this place is that you have to go home.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice!”
Reviews.Author: djgrrrl
Reviews.Content: It was very comfortable, clean and stocked with things we would need for the first few days of our stay. Nice kitchen with all you need for cooking, etc...Washer/dryer inside the apartment, pools, hot tub, poolside bar, friendly staff! Great place to stay! **10 minutes or so to Disney parks, free shuttle** Walking distance to some common restaurants and Publix grocery store.

Reviews.Title: “Value for money. home from home.”
Reviews.Author: msrockhopper
Reviews.Content: nd Target all within 5 mins. drive. To sum up if your undecided where to go just book this place, go and enjoy yourself.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: TrippinmamaGA
Reviews.Content: We stayed here last week, and it couldn't have been any better. The villa was very clean, and the beds were comfortable. Our T.V. in the larger bedroom didn't work very well, but we hardly watched it anyway. There was a pool, playground, and tennis courts, but we didn't use them, we were so exhausted from going to the parks. The villas are about 5-10 minutes from the Disney parks, depending on traffic. Kitchens are fully stocked with all the equipment you could need (dishwaher, coffee maker, dishsoap). The dryer did take a little long to dry the clothes, but It was probably because the lint trap was hard to find, it's hidden on the back to the right. I would definitely recommend this place to everyone, and can't wait to go back next year.

Reviews.Title: “yes yes the best hoilday we had in 4 years”
Reviews.Author: mic187
Reviews.Content: we got there on the 9 sep the kids love there room very clen the pool was great just acorss the road from are houes all the staf wear so help full nothing was a prolem i would stay there the next time wee go back close to all the disney parks and hand to the shopes it very good had the best hoilday thanks to staying there

Reviews.Title: “a lovely place to stay”
Reviews.Author: kazeli2002
Reviews.Content: I went for my first time in Florida - we were picked up from the airport and dropped off at the villas reception - the gentleman behind the desk was polite and helpful - rooms as judged above - lovely clean felt like a small home from home - towels - crockery all the kitchen gadgets you could need - the transport from the villas were ok - felt crammed into the back of the vehicles they used - and you had one or two drop off and pick up times which where sometimes abit binding - so we got a taxi back a few times - tiring if you sent off at 08.40 and not returning till 7 or 8 at night - next time I think I ll drive - just to have that flexability - would have liked some directions in the rooms to the local shops - the local taxi firms were very inconsistant with there charges from the villas to walmart - which was a bit annoying - the villas have basics like toilet rolls washing up liquid etc and delivered more the next week - dont waste packing space with towels they have plenty in bathrooms and provide you with towels for the pool, there is also a washing machine and tumble dryer so I actually came home with no dirty laundry - a good place to stay - clean and we felt safe the whole time we were there - the gym consists of about 4 - 5 pieces of equipment the smallest gym I've ever seen

Reviews.Title: “the best location which was clean functional and friendly.”
Reviews.Author: firstimersScotland
Reviews.Content: This location is close to all the parks and some outlet shopping centres a free shuttle service was provided which ran at various times and suited our needs as we did not hire a car. If going to Busch gardens it is $40 return but this is cheaper than car hire.ranging from $60-$90 plus insurance The reception pool and bar areas were clean and the staff were helpful and friendly.The villa was well suited to our needs providing everything you need for a self catering holiday,the washer and dryer came in very handy. Maid service (towels and sheets)once weekly.Large supermarket shops and restaurants within walking distance made our holiday complete.

Reviews.Title: “excellent resort ,great location”
Reviews.Author: rob d
Reviews.Content: travelled here on 13may 2009 very good set up condos very neat and everything you need is in them.There are 3 pools within the resort .disneyland 3mile away just exit on to osceala parkway and you are there. great holiday will definately return!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for a family”
Reviews.Author: Tsean
Reviews.Content: The hotel is well located, not far from main parks. The units are spacious, on 2 floors with 2 real bedrooms, 1 large living room with kitchen. Ideal for large families or parties. Our unit was far from the main pool, becareful that near the pool, it can be quiet noisy, as the pool is opened till midnight, with music. You can easily live in these units as at home, with all the necessary stuff to cook. We had an issue with the garden door, but it was solved in a friendly manner, the guy being obviously used to this. We really enjoyed this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great value and great service”
Reviews.Author: GQJimmy
Reviews.Content: I chose this resort for the tennis, basketball, pools and location. But I was really impressed with the service. They went out of their way to please us, they even changed the lights on the tennis courts just because we mentioned it. You can play sports or swim until midnight. I have traveled around the world and stayed at 5 star resorts and have not recieved that type of coustomer service. Thanks to Deana, Arnaldi M, Carolina, and the rest of the team, for making our stay enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “excellent.like home from home.”
Reviews.Author: lupadacious
Reviews.Content: Would just like to say that after seeing some reviews on fantasy villas i was a bit sceptical about what to expect,i need not had worried, The accomadation was superb everything looked brand new and was a 2 bed terraced house basically. The complex was spotless with lots of events for kids. Overall i would recommend this resort to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome deal, very clean, quiet close to everything.”
Reviews.Author: Stan2n
Reviews.Content: This place has it all, especially for the price! Its about a 1/2 hour to Disney -- to the front gate, after you drive there, park your car and take a boat / bus. Its close! Everything you'd ever want is nearby. The main pool is a good size and the hot tub is HOT! Only criticism would be the unit's dishwasher was a bit loud; which was easily fixed by running it while we were out. It was very quiet and very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Great bargain”
Reviews.Author: luvschocolate
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Fantasy World Resort in Kissimee on 3/13-14. Great deal. It was an end unit of condos rented out. Booked ours on Orbitz.com. Had a small fully equipped kitchen (stove, mike, d/w, utensils, corkscrew, wine glasses, plates, dish soap, deterg-d/w and clothes washer, etc.). Had a stackable w/d, a full bath upstairs w/2bedrooms-one queen, 2 twins, a bath downstairs w/shower. Don't know if couch pulled out. Had two barstools and a table for 4 w/island motif-bamboo and palm trees prints. Couple miles from Disney. Got take out from Smokey Bones nearby-delicious. Ate at Columbia house in Celebration-great restaurant. Would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place, great value, nice staff”
Reviews.Author: jon_cool99
Reviews.Content: This place is beautiful! If you stay, be sure to ask for a newly refurbished unit as they are much nicer and updated with new TV's, new beds, and new paint/furniture. If you are looking to stay short or long, this is the place to stay! Awesome value for your money!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, nice Appartment, clean”
Reviews.Author: mg170
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a few nights. We stayed at a 2 Bedroom Apartment. It was very clean. Everything was just perfect. Friendly staff. Nice Pool. Nice Bar. Good location for all Walt Disney Parks went to all of them.

Reviews.Title: “really late”
Reviews.Author: camacho33
Reviews.Content: this hotel was terrific! i am really late putting in a comment and only remembered because i am booking with them again.They were very helpful with every question that i had.I love this hotel and i would tell anyone to stay here i have told everyone that i know about the wonderful experience that i had with this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Seabird0055
Reviews.Content: Friendly and helpful check in staff. Nicely furnished and clean two bedroom villa on two floors. (refurbished in 2007). Fully equipped kitchen, so we didn't eat out at all. Great location with a Publix supermarket within 5 minute drive. Super Target and huge Walmart within a ten minute drive. Located close to Disney but also good access to the freeway so easy to get to other attractions. Although there is a shuttle would ideally need own transport to stay here. Nice pool, friendly people and quiet at night. Screened patio is a bit offputting at first, but keeps the bugs out so you get used to it. Good value for money. Enjoyed it so returned for a two night stay at the end of our holiday before flying back to UK.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: vah123
Reviews.Content: Arrived on Christmas morning at 4am. Check in took about 3 minutes..................previously requested an updated room..called to confirm on xmas eve., said it should be no problem to grant my request. Arrived in room...room was spectacular!...brand new kitchen, new appliances, fridge was spotless, kitchen stocked with brand new silverware, pots, pans, glassware, also came with blender, toaster hand mixer, knife sets....... Unit was very clean and comfy...new light fixtures, 3 tv's one in liv room, master br, and 2nd br. 2 full baths, stayed in unit 1104. Unit was an excellent amount of space for myself, my 10 yr old son, and 21 yr old daughter. Renting a car is a must!.....didnt rent one until 2nd day. Was able to go to Super Walmart for groceries, etc...unit is also equipped with washer and dryer. We absolutely loved our stay and will def return next year! Be sure to request an updated unit...one family that we met..had a horrible 70's inspired/decorated room...filthy carpet, old appliances..they couldnt believe how nice and modern our unit was..they dealt directly with the owner being these are all owned by private owners...they didnt even get that much of a deal...i book with an onlibe travel site and received a great deal with airfare included. If you stay here u will not be dissapointed!

Reviews.Title: “good resort”
Reviews.Author: drewbearLeeds
Reviews.Content: My family and i stopped here in may for 2 weeks and i must admit upon arrival i thought oh no! from the outside homes look grubby but in side was clean and comfortable ,we had all the things we needed eg washing liquid ect ,and 2 shops were only 2 mins walk away for anything else we needed, as was at least 5 restaurrants which was good! the only complaint was the free transport to the parks which left very early in the morning and picked you up at quite late at night with hot days we could'nt stand being in parks for 11hrs at a time!! but it was free so thank you anyway . there was always plenty going on at the pool ,bbq ,discos ,painting comps ect plenty for all. so overall a good place to stay clean ,freindly and close to amenitys .will book here next year.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: blynaugh
Reviews.Content: My wife and daughter stayed here for 4 nights in December for a trip to Disney World. The villas are definitely older, but they have been updated with new kitchens and bath complete with marble counters and updated appliances. Their location is great for Disney as they are just a couple of miles from the parks. They also have a shuttle that goes to each park a couple times a day for free. We had just a couple of minor issues. First, they should've spent some of the money from the kitchen/bath remodel on new mattresses. They weren't horribly uncomfortable, but they were so loud when you sat on them or rolled over... Second, we did have a minor ant infestation in the first floor bathroom, but only on the last night we were there. Bugs are a fact of life in Florida and the staff was very responsive when we notified them of the issue. Finally, we mistakenly left a door unlocked in our car and our GPS was stolen on the second to last night. This was our fault, but it did put a damper on our experience. Crime is a fact of life, but I have to think that places like Orlando are going to be hit harder than most due to the recession as it is so tourist-driven and the less disposible income people have, the less they will travel to places like Orlando...hence, a higher crime rate. Overall, the Fantasy World Villas are an excellent option for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Home Away From Home! Loved our villa!”
Reviews.Author: terrigrl74
Reviews.Content: Absolutely loved our villa! Having all that room was great! We had a full kitchen, stove, oven, microwave, refrig, stocked full of pots pans dishes utensils, anything you could possibly need. Nice table and chairs, sleeper couch and chair. We didnt use the sleeper couch, so Im not sure how comfortable it was. The couch wasnt really very comfortable, but we werent really on it that much. Washer and dryer were small, but were such a plus. I came home with suitcases full of clean laundry! The only minus was having to do all the housework and stripping the beds and emptying garbage cans and the refrigerator while trying to rush to our early morning flight. I asked about housekeeping services at the front desk, and they didnt seem to know what I was talking about. It was fine, we just had to keep tidy. There were some ants and lil bugs in the bathroom. I bought some raid ant spray and I didnt have a problem again. It is florida, so its to be expected. It was definitely a 3 star resort, with lots of room to spread out!

Reviews.Title: “Just perfect”
Reviews.Author: dano22
Reviews.Content: My family of 5 went to WDW for a week. We started at another Hotel but found it to be too small for 3 active boys. We had heard about Fantasy world Villas and decided to take a tour. The friendly staff allowed us to see their model and we instantly new it would be right for us. (2) levels, full kitchen, (2) bathrooms w/ showers. Nicely updated in 2008. The funny thing was that when I went back to the front desk to change hotels, the best price they could offer me was $165/night. I simply walked about 30 feet to their computer area (free to guests) and booked online through Expedia for $77/night. Be sure and ask for a newly renovated room on the website when you book it- some rooms have not been redone yet! Once we changed hotels we were very happy. No daily maid service- but that was fine with us- we don't change towels and bed linens every day at home either. And despite some unseasonably cold weather- the heated pool was great and the kids used it quite a bit. This was the perfect spot for a family of 5!

Reviews.Title: “Nice place-great staff!”
Reviews.Author: TravelgalMankato
Reviews.Content: I am the travel agent that booked my own vacation for myself and family. It was booked as a air/hotel package with the hotel being pre-paid. When we arrived I was told that the hotel had been cancelled!! We were still able to get a 2 BR villa, but I had to pay for it again!..... The villas were roomy and my grandson and I especially enjoyed the pool area. The bartender.....who's name tag said "Bartender" was a great guy. Never did find out his name but he and his wife are expecting their 1st child! (Good luck dude!) The bedrooms were good size with good size closets. The kitchen had everything you would need and it was all very clean. The resort is a little old and could use a little fixing up here and there, but for the most part was good enough for us, since we were only there for 3 nights. The location was pretty decent, as it was close to the main drag where all the retraunts were. (We managed to get a pretty decent breakfast buffet for $399!) I wouldn't stay here again, because I'm alsmot certain it was their mistake that my hotel reservation was cancelled....But as a travel agent I have and would again send my clients to this resort. It's got a great for family atmosphere!

Reviews.Title: “Great with kids”
Reviews.Author: vandrare
Reviews.Content: We recently returned from a week + at the Fantasy World Clun Villas. This is a great place to stay at with children. The units consist of a kitchen and living area on the main floor and bedrooms up-stairs. We found the unit to be well equipped, clean and comfortable. Although, the hotel offers a scheduled shuttle to Disney, we never used it. It takes about 15 minutes to drive from the hotel to the central parking area at Disney. Our children enjoyed the pool area at the hotel and pool towels were provided. Unless you are willing to pay extra, there is no house keeping offered throughout your stay. As the unit was well equipped with both washer, dryer and basic cleaning tools, we managed just fine throughout our stay. The only thing that this hotel lacked was a recycle program. The garbage container we used was full of recycable matters that simply shouldnt be in it. Glass bottles, papers, cans and plastic don't belong on the tip! We mentioned this oversight to the hotel management upon our check-out. Please do the same.

Reviews.Title: “My great disney holiday”
Reviews.Author: allishade
Reviews.Content: It was exactly like the photos. Amazing holiday. Secruity took us to our villa because we arrived late at night and couldn't find it. Very friendly staff. Lovely places Disney is great not just for kids. Walmart good for shopping. Gift shops and restaurants near within walking distance. Need car. Must be 25+. E-Z cars for younger drivers Shuttle service to parks excellent. Weather hot & humid througout. Rained & tropical storm 2nd week. Weather very unpredictable.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Tinkerbell_7
Reviews.Content: I booked this resort for a trip with my three grown kids. We wanted to see both the East and West coast and go to Disney. The Orlando/Kissimmee area is the perfect location for a trip such as this. Upon arrival we were greeted in the lobby by a very efficient young lady. The property is pretty spread out so we were given a map. We got to our villa and we absolutely loved it. I read other reviews which advised that we ask in advance for one of the remodeled villas. I didn't do this but apparently we lucked out because our villa was beautiful. We didn't want to leave the resort. Of course we did because we had plans but we couldn't wait to get back each evening and would sometimes cut our excursions short just to be able to enjoy our villa and the facilities. We did end up planning a day to stay at the resort so that we could get the most out of what it had to offer and to enjoy our beautiful condo. Our villa had two bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a kitchen, dining area, living room and a screened in patio. It had two plasma tv's, one in the living room and one in the master bedroom. The second bedroom also had a tv. Not only did it include everything you would need for a week, the washer dryer and dishwasher were added luxuries. I came home not having to do laundry. The pool was great and the hot tub was hot and large and a great place to soothe your aching feet. If the main pool gets too crowded, you have the option of two other pools to choose from. We were quite happy with the main pool which had plenty of chairs and tables to choose from and the bar for sodas or cocktails. My sons spent some time almost every night at the bar located at the main pool. John, the bartender there was excellent, he had a pleasant personality and was informative about the area. Disney is only three miles straight down the road out front, in fact we got lost looking for the resort and ended up at Disney, that's how close it is. From this resort we visited Clearwater Beach, Daytona Beach, Smyrna Beach, Disney, and Busch Gardens. This is a great place to stay. We booked as a combination package deal and probably got a better deal than if we had booked separately so it's a good idea to check out the packages if you plan to limit your stay to just one resort. I can't think of a single bad thing to say about this resort. I only wished we had booked a longer vacation. We loved it and will definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: kjonesee
Reviews.Content: Was hesitant to stay here after reading some of the reviews, but we had a great experience. Booked through Travelocity and got a great rate on room and car rental. Place was perfect for adults traveling with childrem. There are 3 tv's--so everyone can enjoy their own space. We bought food at the nearby WalMart for breakfast and dinner--only had to buy one family meal per day at Disney. Rooms were clean, mattresses were rather uncomfortable--but not unbearable, kitchen well stocked, washer and dryer were such a treat! The upstairs plumbing was rather loud--but not a problem unless you were sitting downstairs. Also, It would have been nice to have more than a starter pack of cleaning and paper supplies--we stayed 7 nights and received the same ration of goods as people who stayed 2 or 3 nights--we ended up having to buy more toilet paper and had to ask for more garbage bags. The villas are close to everything--driving distance to any type of restaurant and store you can imagine. We were approached about purchasing time share, but I politely refused and was treated very professional by the sales agent. The atmosphere of the villas was very quiet and serene, despite being there during peak season. I would gladly stay at this resort again.

Reviews.Title: “very poor standard”
Reviews.Author: TeessideViewer
Reviews.Content: The town house was listed with a private pool and jacuzzi ours had neither. The walls furniture and carpets were dirty the screened porch had holes in it letting in insects. The door closer was hanging off. The property did have 3 tv`s although 2 were faulty. The bathroom had long black hairs in the bath. All in all not very impressed.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: Bobadoochi
Reviews.Content: Me my wife and daughter just returned yesterday from an 8 day stay in Florida visiting my sister and her family who live in St. Cloud. We are missing them and Florida already. Staying at the Fantasy World Club Villas made our visit this year most enjoyable. Check-in and check-out was quick and easy and the hotel staff were friendly,helpful and courteous. The villa we stayed in was emaculate and provided us with all the comforts of home. The beds were a little creeky but the mattresses and the pillows were extremely comfortable. The air conditioning kicked [--] so if you are going in the more humid months you will have no problem keeping cool. Route 192 is right outside the villa property and there are many restaurants, fast food joints and discount gift shops to choose from and all within walking distance On days we did'nt go to a theme park or visit my sister we hung around the villa and enjoyed the pool, played tennis, and in the evening after dinner my wife and daughter would use the gym equipment located off the lobby. I travel on a budget and I've stayed in other villas and this is by far the best experience I have had. Personally I would give this resort a 4 star rating instead of the 2 and a half star listed on Expedia.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: itskbs
Reviews.Content: This was our first family trip to the Orlando area with the kids. They're age 12 and 9, it was great to have a room for them with a tv of their own for down time in the morning and night time. The villa itself was good, although it appeared larger in the photos online. But, compare that to a one room hotel and you're so much more pleased to be able to spread out after a long day on your feet. We had requested a villa that was updated and ended up to be a great location. Near to the main office and a pool outside our patio. They did replace fencing around the pool while we were there, but it was all done during the day while we were pretty much gone. The staff was great, a little hard to understand sometimes since we only speak english and one had a hard time understanding us. Supplies are provided for cooking, a little bit of laundry, dishes, broom and mop. They do offer housekeeping for a fee, we chose not to as we were not there a lot. Great location, not exactly to find according to the directions that we were given. But, we managed just fine. It's close to major highways and quick to get to anything. Having to go to the office to use the internet was a bit of an annoyance, but we were on vacation. So that's okay, a break from reality at Fantasy World was just fine. Highly recommend getting bottled water though, the tap water has a swampy smell to it. With the heat down there we had to have a lot of water. Overall, we were very pleased with our stay.

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC DEAL”
Reviews.Author: yoyos1
Reviews.Content: Five adults stayed there in May and it was terific. Was a little nervous about the place at first until we arrived. It was very clean. Staff was friendly. Close to all the parks. Alot of restaurants and stores nearby. They offer a shuttle to the parks two different times in the morning and two different times for pickup in the evening. Had a guard in the evenings. May have been there all day but didn't notice him until the evening. Very nice clean pools. Washer, dryer, fridge, microwave, stove, tv, couch, chair, etc. and almost anything you would want. The only one thing I would have liked better and I did see it on one of the reviews was the pillows were small and kind of flat. So if you have a bad neck like I do I would suggest bringing your own pillow. I would return to the Fantasy and would recommend it to all.

Reviews.Title: “Big Fan of the Fantasy World Villas”
Reviews.Author: actaeon
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Fantasy World Villas in early April '08. Can't speak highly enough of the resort. Always something for the kids to do. Close to restaurants and supermarkets and easy to find from the airport. All the parks are within easy access of the complex. The accomodation itself was in excellent condition and there was ample space for 2 adults and 2 children. Would definately consider going back again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Holiday”
Reviews.Author: Billy01London
Reviews.Content: This was our first time in America and we were not sure what to expect. The accomodation was fantastic, it was clean spacious and very comfortable. We were in a great location very easy to get to all the parks, shopping outlets etc. We all enjoyed the pool and found it easy to get sunbeds whatever time we went to the pool. The accomodation was perfect for us with the two bedrooms both with TVs which prevented the usual arguements over who was watching what on telly. It was lovely to come back from a long day at the parks to be able to sit and relax then go around the pool for a few drinks a perfect end to the day!! We are looking to go to Floriday again next year and would book this accomodation againg without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Fantasy!”
Reviews.Author: Mel7285
Reviews.Content: My family of 4 stayed the week of April 18th to April 27th, my husband/mother/daughter and myself. This is the second time we have stayed within this complex, the first was at the condo towers but this was our first time at the villas. We really enjoyed our stay and found that the villas were definatly the better way to go because of the extra space. They are currently renovating a lot of the villa’s, but were considerate with the construction to happen while you weren’t in your room. Ours had been renovated but the town home beside us were going through construction, but like I said before they did most of the work during the day and not too early in the morning. You will have everything you will need supply wise in the kitchen (cutlery, plates, dishes etc). They have beach towels located in the cupboard underneath the TV in the main room for the pool. The washer/dryer is located on the second level and can be a bit loud so don’t run at night. They also provide enough dishwashing/detergent/bounce sheets for a couple of loads. It’s located right near a 24 hour Wal-Mart for those of you who will check in late. The main reception area was under construction as well, but check in happens in a clearly marked town home near by. The pool was amazing, the main pool has a bar that does bbq. I miss it already!

Reviews.Title: “great value accomodation”
Reviews.Author: rovingranger
Reviews.Content: We had stayed eight years ago , so wasn't sure how things had changed , the accomodation was booked over the internet so was very reasonable. Because of the size of our party we had booked two town houses , when we arrived they were next to each other as requested. The accomodation is clean and the rooms failly well furnished , the air conditioning is excellent , as well as the showers which never ran out of hot water. A good size tv with 40 channels is in the main living room and the two bedrooms. The pools are good and lots of tennis courts. we didn't use the pool bar but the prices were very good. The two plus points are a, it's very easy to get to all the disney parks within 10 minutes and b, you can walk to good resturants near by . Definetly good value and would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: HoughtonYooper
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful spring break. My wife and two teenage daughters throughly enjoyed our visit. Pool and activities were great! Shopping, dining was within a mile of our villa. Owners and staff were top notch. Close to all water parks and Disney. Will definitely stay again. The rental itself contained everything that we needed for a weeks stay. Two story two bedroom gave us all our space during the week.

Reviews.Title: “The Best Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: dannyjohnson
Reviews.Content: Was only here for one night because expedia messed up our other reservation at the comfort suites but i wished i would have booked this for the whole week staff was great and townhome was very nice stay here its a really good place

Reviews.Title: “Fantasy World was a dream come true”
Reviews.Author: RedE2Travel
Reviews.Content: I booked this place sight unseen, and was nervous about what to expect. What a pleasant surprise!!! My three boys and husband all loved it too! Although they were remodeling the clubhouse, the staff's willingness to please and their joyful smiles warmed us up immediately. The villas and surrounding areas were breathtaking and very clean. Once we got into our villa, the newly remodeled rooms were so inviting. In fact, my kids almost preferred to hang out in the villa and all that the resort had to offer (tennis courts, basketball courts, shuffle board, choice of three pools) instead of going to Sea World and Universal. Everything was sooooo clean, beds were comfortable, washer and dryer worked fine, and it had everything to make our stay enjoyable. There are a lot of restaurants all within walking distance (Ci Ci's Pizza, Olive Garden, Taco Bell, Arby's, Bob Evans to name a few). Super Wal-Mart and Publix are great places to stock up on food and water. Definitely take advantage of the jugs of drinking water at those stores. Great for making coffee and kool-aid. The water in Florida was our only drawback, although it was suggested that we boil water for ten minutes to get rid of sulfuric smell, we decided to just buy jugs and water bottles. Even on Universal Island/Studio and Sea World, bring your own snacks and water bottles (saves you lots of money and it's allowed in). There are lockers at those place where you can store "stuff" for free. Our stay at Fantasy World Club Villas was certainly one we will never forget. Hope you enjoy yourself there as much as we did!

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected”
Reviews.Author: DogStar5988
Reviews.Content: I had read so many reviews before I left for my vacation and I was getting a little nervous about this hotel. But everything was better than I thought it would be. The room was clean, the people were very nice, the location was very convienent with Cici's pizza, Olive Garden, and Arbys right there. Plus some nice little gift shops and a store to buy groceries. The main pool has a party on Saturday nights with food music and games that was a lot of fun. I had to have a few drinks before I was willing to play along but it was a great time. I don't know if some rooms are worse than others but we stayed in rm 1113 in Spaceport Court and it was really nice. The guys that did the shuttle were very nice and were usually on time (maybe 5-10 min off tops). We used them for all of our Taxi services and they were reasonably priced. It was around $25 to get to Universal from there if we decieded to leave before the free pickup time. Which we usually didn't do to save money. All in all a great vacation. Wish I was still there :P.

Reviews.Title: “Very Happy with Our Stay at Fantasy World”
Reviews.Author: OntarioCritic
Reviews.Content: What a relief to find such a wonderful villa for the same price of a hotel room!!!! Such accommodations allowed for privacy and good rest with 2 floors, 2 bedrooms, kitchen, living room, 2 bathrooms and a nice outside sitting area. Very clean and nicely decorated. We enjoyed the heated pool outside our unit and the location just behind 192 is excellent. The check in staff were very polite and kind.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: RonJac
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed for 1 week in mid January. Currently they are remodling the office area and you check in at one of the units right next door. It was a bit crowded but fairly quick. The unit was a nice and clean with 2 bedrooms up and a kicthen. dining area and a living area with a sofa and chair. The kitchen was fairly weel equiped altough it would have been nice to have an ice makes. Full size appliances in the kitchen. The beds were fairly comfortable and there were TV's in each of the bedrooms. The stackable washer and dryer are great. It was nice to not have to pack enough clothes for the entire week and to come home with clean clothes. The locations is close to reaturants and shopping and only a short drive from the attractions. We went to play golf so it was necessary to rent a car. We would certainly go there again!

Reviews.Title: “Worst experience ever!”
Reviews.Author: josie71185
Reviews.Content: This resort was horrible! They lost our reservation and it took over 2 hours to get booked in and I had to print out my credit card statement to prove that we paid for one night because they were statiang that we didnt pay for anything. The next night we got home frmo a long day at disney and our keys didnt work for the room so i had to go back and complain yet again. The staff was not very friendly and inviting and when you travel with a toddler you do not want to deal with that aggrivation. It was not worth our money at all!!

Reviews.Title: “Good value for families”
Reviews.Author: Nettmel
Reviews.Content: We traveled with two adults and three grown kids (23, 18 and 16 years old). The kids complained that their beds weren't comfortable. The room smelled like cat urine initially-unsure if it was, but once you turned on the air, it disappeared. The staff was exceptional. Pools (two heated and one not) and hot tub were always clean. No life guard on duty. They provide tennis racquets, balls and a basketball for the courts. Happy hour a few times during the day at poolside. Shuttle times weren't convenient for us, but we had rented a car through Budget. Cost of shuttle from airport to and from villa would have run us close to $200, so it was more economical for us to rent a car. Super Walmart, SuperTarget, Super K-mart, Publix close driving distance. Every restaurant imaginable close by. If staying there, things you need to bring/buy are-coffee, coffee filters, laundry detergent, dishwasher detergent ( I bought those "capsule" type and brought them back home), and large and small baggies. I could have used measuring cups and a mixing bowl-they were not provided, so I made due.They only gave you one or two packets of these things, but you can purchase more from them. We cooked breakfast there, made sandwiches and took bottled water and flavor packets to put in them to the parks in a vinyl lined backpack with a frozen cooler ice pack placed in a baggie. The parks allow you to brink in backpacks, but not coolers. We always had hot water for 5 consecutive showers. The villa provides enough towels. The washer and dryer are small, takes two drying cycles to dry. We had two freezing days of weather and had to go to Walmart for sweatshirts.
